title: READY 2 LEARN Glitter Foam Stickers - Silver and Gold Stars - Pack of 168 - Self-Adhesive Stickers - Stickers for Scrapbooks and Cards
description: Create sparkly scenes and personalize your stuff with foam stickers! This sticker pack includes 168 star-shaped stickers in silver and gold. The set also features 3 different sizes. These self-adhesive stickers easily peel away from their wax sheets for frustration-free craft time. These 3D stickers are durable, thick and easy to hold. Use these stickers to decorate DIY projects or personalize water bottles, computers, phones, arts and crafts, and more! Give these stickers as rewards after chores and homework. Or, use them as party favors and stocking stuffers. Kids will love to collect these decorative, glittery star stickers! These stickers will make your crafting supplies sparkle. || Size of largest star: 1.6”L || Size of smallest star: 0.6”L.
